traits.name: Addressable
traits.description:
Canonical multi-role address trait with validation metadata, geocoding, and international formatting hooks.
Provides a single, reusable capability for billing, shipping, warehouse, and office addresses.

parameters.name: roles
parameters.description: Ordered list of supported address roles (billing, shipping, warehouse, etc.).

parameters.name: defaultRole
parameters.description: Preferred role returned when consumers omit a role argument.

parameters.name: allowDynamicRoles
parameters.description: Allow runtime creation of roles that are not pre-declared in roles.

address_roles.description: Ordered list of roles that currently have address entries.

default_address_role.description: Role surfaced in UI contexts when one address must be highlighted.

addresses.description: Collection of { role, address, metadata } entries keyed by role.

accessibility.keyboard: AddressEditor respects standard focus order and announces role changes.
accessibility.screenreader: AddressCollection surfaces headings per role and announces validation status.

references: R21.1 Canonical Model for Address/Location Systems

traits.name: Archivable
traits.description: Provides archival lifecycle management with configurable retention, restoration, and semantic tokens.

parameters.name: gracePeriodDays
parameters.description: Number of days after archival before permanent deletion occurs.

parameters.name: retainHistory
parameters.description: Whether archival retains a readable change history that can be restored.

parameters.name: restoreWindowDays
parameters.description: Maximum number of days archived entities can be restored when history is retained.

is_archived.description: Flag indicating whether the entity is currently archived.

archived_at.description: Timestamp for when the entity entered the archived state.

restored_at.description: Timestamp for when the entity was restored from an archived state.

archive_reason.description: Optional narrative describing why the entity was archived.

accessibility.screenreader: Announces archival status and retention windows.

traits.name: Authable
traits.description:
Role-based access control extension pack grounded in the R21.2 membership pattern.
Encodes roles, permissions, memberships, and adjacency edges for tenant-aware RBAC.

parameters.name: defaultRoleId
parameters.description: Role identifier applied when tenants are provisioned without an explicit role (R21.2 2.3).

parameters.name: hierarchyDepthLimit
parameters.description: Maximum recursion depth when traversing role hierarchies for derived permissions.

membership_records.description: SaaS membership triple (user_id, organization_id, role_id) with UNIQUE constraint (TABLE 4).

role_hierarchy_edges.description: Parentchild adjacency list for hierarchical RBAC (Part 3.1).

session_roles.description: Materialized roles granted within the current session/token exchange.

accessibility.keyboard: RoleAssignmentForm keeps add/remove buttons in reading order.
accessibility.screenreader: MembershipPanel announces organization, role, and permission counts per entry.

references: R21.2 Canonical Data Models for Authorization Systems

traits.name: Billable
traits.description: Normalizes recurring billing fields including price, currency, and cycle tracking metadata.

parameters.name: defaultCurrency
parameters.description: ISO 4217 currency used when a value is not provided.

parameters.name: billingIntervals
parameters.description: Allowed billing interval values.

parameters.name: minorUnits
parameters.description: Number of fractional units that constitute a single major currency unit.

amount.description: Recurring price expressed in minor currency units.

last_payment_at.description: Timestamp of the most recent successful payment.

next_payment_due_at.description: Timestamp when the next payment attempt is scheduled.

current_period_start.description: Beginning timestamp of the active billing cycle.

current_period_end.description: Ending timestamp of the active billing cycle.

current_period_progress.description: Decimal (0-1) indicating progress through the active billing cycle.

traits.name: Cancellable
traits.description: Adds lifecycle-aware cancellation workflows with policy guardrails and semantic token mappings.

parameters.name: allowCancellationAfterStart
parameters.description: Whether cancellation may occur after the entity transitions to an active state.

parameters.name: cancellationWindowHours
parameters.description: Number of hours after activation where cancellation is permitted.

parameters.name: requireReason
parameters.description: Whether a structured cancellation reason must be supplied by the actor.

parameters.name: allowedReasons
parameters.description: Allow list of valid cancellation reason codes when requireReason is true.

cancel_at_period_end.description: Indicates whether cancellation occurs at the natural period end instead of immediately.

cancellation_reason.description: Free-form detail describing why cancellation occurred.

cancellation_reason_code.description: Structured reason code chosen from the allowedReasons parameter.

cancellation_requested_at.description: Timestamp capturing when the cancellation workflow was initiated.

traits.name: Classifiable
traits.description: Canonical taxonomy + folksonomy trait supporting taxonomy, tag, and hybrid modes with governance metadata.

parameters.name: classification_mode
parameters.description: taxonomy = hierarchical only, tag = folksonomy only, hybrid = WordPress three-table pattern.

parameters.name: hierarchy_storage_model
parameters.description: Storage pattern for taxonomy hierarchies. materialized_path assumes ltree for <3ms subtree queries.

parameters.name: tag_policy
parameters.description: Controls whether tags are curated only (locked), require moderation, or are open to user generation.

parameters.name: max_tags
parameters.description: Maximum number of canonical tags per object.

parameters.name: require_primary_category
parameters.description: Require at least one primary taxonomy category.

classification_metadata.description: Operational metadata describing mode, storage model, governance rules, and audit timestamps.

categories.description: Ordered taxonomy nodes scoped to the object.

primary_category_id.description: Identifier of the canonical taxonomy node.

tags.description: Canonical tag collection after synonym collapse.

tag_count.description: Number of canonical tags assigned to the object.

tag_preview.description: Denormalized comma-delimited preview for list renders.

traits.name: Colorized
traits.description: Maps lifecycle states to semantic color tokens for consistent status theming.

parameters.name: colorStates
parameters.description: Semantic color keys applied to the status badge.

color_state.description: Semantic color token key derived from the provided color states.

traits.name: Communicable
traits.description:
Canonical communication trait that unifies multi-channel delivery, template governance,
delivery policies, and threaded conversations derived from R20.1/R20.6 research. Provides
orchestration-ready schemas for channels, messages, policies, and conversations with
Preferenceable/Authable/Classifiable integration points.

parameters.name: channelTypes
parameters.description: Channels enabled for the tenant (R20.1 Part 2.1 multi-channel taxonomy).

parameters.name: supportConversations
parameters.description: Toggle for threaded conversations in addition to standalone messages.

template_catalog.description: Localized template definitions with declared variables per R20.1 Part 2.3.

messages.description: Atomic message payloads queued for delivery (R20.6 Part 1.2 primitives).

conversations.description: Multi-party threaded conversations with membership metadata (R20.6 Part 3.3).

message_statuses.description: Delivery state machine transitions (queued  sent  delivered  failed  retried  read).

accessibility.keyboard: ChannelGrid keeps linear tab stops and roving focus for template previews.
accessibility.screenreader: MessageEventTimeline announces delivery transitions with ARIA live updates per R20.6 guidance.

references: R20.6 Foundational Analysis of Modern Message and Communication Systems

traits.name: EncodingColor
traits.description:
Maps a data field to chromatic encodings using governed palettes and
redundant channels to fulfill RDV.4 accessibility equivalence rules.

parameters.name: supportedSchemes
parameters.description: Palette categories that this encoding may leverage.

parameters.name: defaultScheme
parameters.description: Palette category used when author does not specify.

parameters.name: redundancyMechanism
parameters.description: Non-color fallback used to satisfy equivalence rules.

parameters.name: minContrast
parameters.description: Minimum contrast ratio enforced between adjacent categories.

parameters.name: channel
parameters.description: Which graphical channel color touches (fill vs stroke).

viz_encoding_color_scheme.description: Palette category used for this encoding.

viz_encoding_color_channel.description: Graphical channel that carries color (fill or stroke).

viz_encoding_color_redundancy.description: Secondary channel used for equivalence (texture, shape, label).

viz_encoding_color_min_contrast.description: Minimum enforced contrast ratio between adjacent categories.

viz_encoding_color_description.description: Natural language summary for fallback narratives.
viz_encoding_color_description.default: Uses governed palette with redundant encodings per RDV.4.

accessibility.notes: Requires redundant encoding + 4.5:1 contrast for adjacent hues.

references: cmos/research/data-viz-oods/RDV.4_Validation of Accessibility Equivalence in Trait-Driven Visualization Systems.md
cmos/research/data-viz-oods/RDS.7_synthesis_Mission Completion Report- Trait-Driven Visualization System Specification (v0.1).md

traits.name: EncodingPositionX
traits.description:
Binds a data field to the horizontal axis. Declares allowed data types,
scale defaults, and accessibility metadata to satisfy Normalized Viz Spec
requirements.

parameters.name: fieldKinds
parameters.description: Data categories that can map to the X axis.

parameters.name: defaultScale
parameters.description: Default scale used when none is specified by the spec author.

parameters.name: includeZero
parameters.description: Whether quantitative mappings force a zero baseline.

parameters.name: axisTitle
parameters.description: Default title surfaced in axis + a11y description.

parameters.name: sorting
parameters.description: Default sort applied to discrete categories.

viz_encoding_x_field.description: Name of the data field bound to the X axis.

viz_encoding_x_field_kind.description: Data classification used for heuristics and validation.

viz_encoding_x_scale.description: Scale identifier applied to values (linear or temporal).

viz_encoding_x_include_zero.description: Indicates whether zero baseline enforcement is active.

viz_encoding_x_axis_title.description: Default axis title used in UI and fallback descriptions.

viz_encoding_x_sort.description: Default sort direction for discrete axes.

accessibility.notes: Provide axis titles + descriptions for assistive tech fallbacks.

references: cmos/research/data-viz-oods/RDS.7_synthesis_Mission Completion Report- Trait-Driven Visualization System Specification (v0.1).md

traits.name: EncodingPositionY
traits.description:
Binds a data field to the vertical axis. Provides normalization, default
scale hints, and a11y metadata for describing quantitative measures.

parameters.name: fieldKinds
parameters.description: Data categories that can map to the Y axis.

parameters.name: defaultScale
parameters.description: Default scale used when not specified explicitly.

parameters.name: includeZero
parameters.description: Whether to enforce zero baseline for quantitative data.

parameters.name: axisTitle
parameters.description: Default title surfaced in UI and fallback descriptions.

parameters.name: aggregate
parameters.description: Default aggregation applied when spec omits one.

viz_encoding_y_field.description: Name of the data field bound to the Y axis.

viz_encoding_y_field_kind.description: Data classification used for heuristics and validation.

viz_encoding_y_scale.description: Scale identifier applied to the Y axis.

viz_encoding_y_include_zero.description: Indicates whether zero baseline enforcement is active.

viz_encoding_y_axis_title.description: Default axis title used in UI and fallback descriptions.

viz_encoding_y_aggregate.description: Aggregation strategy applied when spec omits one.

accessibility.notes: Axis title doubles as descriptive label in fallback tables.

references: cmos/research/data-viz-oods/RDS.7_synthesis_Mission Completion Report- Trait-Driven Visualization System Specification (v0.1).md

traits.name: EncodingSize
traits.description:
Maps a quantitative field to glyph size (radius or area) with governed
ranges that can be validated for perceptual correctness and accessibility.

parameters.name: rangeMin
parameters.description: Minimum rendered size in device-independent pixels.

parameters.name: rangeMax
parameters.description: Maximum rendered size in device-independent pixels.

parameters.name: strategy
parameters.description: Interprets values as area or radius for perceptual scaling.

parameters.name: minPixelArea
parameters.description: Minimum accessible area to avoid disappearing glyphs.

parameters.name: maxPixelArea
parameters.description: Maximum accessible area to avoid dominating layout.

viz_encoding_size_field.description: Data field bound to glyph size.

viz_encoding_size_strategy.description: Defines whether size is derived from area or radius.

viz_encoding_size_min_area.description: Minimum accessible area to prevent underflow.

viz_encoding_size_max_area.description: Maximum accessible area to prevent overflow.

viz_encoding_size_description.description: Narrative summary for fallback text/table output.
viz_encoding_size_description.default: Size encodes magnitude using governed perceptual scaling.

accessibility.notes: Ensures glyphs remain perceivable within governed range.

references: cmos/research/data-viz-oods/RDS.7_synthesis_Mission Completion Report- Trait-Driven Visualization System Specification (v0.1).md

traits.name: Geocodable
traits.description:
Indicates that data contains location-resolvable information that can be
mapped to coordinates or geographic boundaries. Supports auto-detection
of geo fields based on naming patterns and field types.

parameters.name: autoDetect
parameters.description: Enable automatic detection of geo fields based on naming patterns.

parameters.name: explicitFields
parameters.description: Explicitly specify which fields contain geographic data.

parameters.name: minConfidence
parameters.description: Minimum confidence threshold for auto-detected fields (0-1).

geo_resolution.description: Type of geographic resolution available (point, boundary, or both).

geo_requires_lookup.description: Whether geographic identifiers require lookup to resolve.

geo_detected_fields.description: Array of detected geo fields with type and confidence.

geo_latitude_field.description: Field name containing latitude values (for point resolution).

geo_longitude_field.description: Field name containing longitude values (for point resolution).

geo_identifier_field.description: Primary field name containing geographic identifiers.

geo_identifier_type.description: Type of geographic identifier (e.g., country, state, fips).

geo_auto_detect_enabled.description: Whether auto-detection of geo fields is enabled.

accessibility.notes: Spatial visualizations require table fallback with region/coordinate data.

traits.name: InteractionHighlight
traits.description: Emphasizes hovered or selected points by adjusting a configurable visual property.

parameters.name: fields
parameters.description: Data fields that define the highlight predicate.

parameters.name: trigger
parameters.description: Event stream that activates the highlight.

parameters.name: property
parameters.description: Visual property to adjust when the predicate is active.

parameters.name: activeValue
parameters.description: Value applied to highlighted marks.

parameters.name: inactiveValue
parameters.description: Value applied to non-highlighted marks.

viz_interaction_highlight_fields.description: Fields copied into the interaction predicate.

viz_interaction_highlight_trigger.description: Event stream used for highlight activation.

viz_interaction_highlight_property.description: Visual property that is conditionally modified.

viz_interaction_highlight_active_value.description: Value applied when the predicate matches.

viz_interaction_highlight_inactive_value.description: Value applied when the predicate does not match.

traits.name: InteractionTooltip
traits.description: Shows contextual details-on-demand when focusing or hovering a specific datum.

parameters.name: fields
parameters.description: Ordered field list rendered inside the tooltip.

parameters.name: trigger
parameters.description: Event stream that reveals the tooltip.

parameters.name: alignment
parameters.description: Preferred tooltip alignment around the data point.

viz_interaction_tooltip_trigger.description: Event stream used to reveal the tooltip.

traits.name: Labelled
traits.description: Provides canonical label, description, and placeholder copy for authored objects.

label.description: Human-readable display name rendered in primary surfaces.

description.description: Supporting description used in detail contexts.

placeholder.description: Hint copy surfaced in form fields when empty.

traits.name: LayoutConcat
traits.description: Defines dashboard-style concatenation for coordinated multi-view experiences.

parameters.name: direction
parameters.description: Primary axis used to arrange concatenated sections.

parameters.name: gap
parameters.description: Gap (px) between concatenated sections.

parameters.name: sharedChannels
parameters.description: Channels propagated across concatenated children.

parameters.name: maxSections
parameters.description: Maximum number of child sections governed by this layout.

parameters.name: projection
parameters.description: Projection hint consumed by adapters.

viz_layout_direction.description: Axis used for arranging concatenated sections.

viz_layout_shared_channels.description: Channels whose domains remain shared across sections.

viz_layout_max_sections.description: Maximum section count before warning triggers.

traits.name: LayoutFacet
traits.description: Repeats a normalized visualization spec across a governed facet grid so row and column groupings stay synchronized with shared color/scale semantics.

parameters.name: rowField
parameters.description: Field used to create facet rows.

parameters.name: columnField
parameters.description: Field used to create facet columns.

parameters.name: wrapDirection
parameters.description: Direction to wrap when panels exceed the budget.

parameters.name: maxPanels
parameters.description: Maximum panel count rendered simultaneously.

parameters.name: sharedChannels
parameters.description: Encoding channels that remain synchronized across panels.

parameters.name: projection
parameters.description: Projection hint consumed by downstream adapters.

viz_layout_rows_field.description: Data field used to derive facet rows.

viz_layout_columns_field.description: Data field used to derive facet columns.

viz_layout_wrap_direction.description: How facets wrap when exceeding panel limits.

viz_layout_shared_channels.description: Channels whose domains remain shared across panels.

viz_layout_projection.description: Projection metadata forwarded to adapters and docs.

traits.name: LayoutLayer
traits.description: Governs sequencing, blending, and shared channel behavior for layered mark compositions.

parameters.name: blendMode
parameters.description: Blend/composite mode applied across stacked marks.

parameters.name: syncInteractions
parameters.description: Whether interaction predicates propagate across all layers.

parameters.name: sharedChannels
parameters.description: Channels whose scales remain synchronized across layers.

parameters.name: orderHint
parameters.description: Optional list describing explicit bottomtop layer ordering.

parameters.name: projection
parameters.description: Projection hint for adapters when layering across spaces.

viz_layout_blend_mode.description: Blend/composite mode applied to layered marks.

viz_layout_sync_interactions.description: Whether interaction predicates are shared across layers.

viz_layout_shared_channels.description: Channels that share a domain across layered marks.

viz_layout_order_hint.description: Optional ordered list describing layer precedence.

viz_layout_projection.description: Projection metadata forwarded to adapters and docs.

traits.name: MarkArea
traits.description:
Canonical area mark for cumulative totals and ranges. Fills the region
between the series baseline and value curve with configurable opacity and
interpolation.

parameters.name: curve
parameters.description: Curve interpolation strategy applied between samples.

parameters.name: opacity
parameters.description: Fill opacity used for the area band.

parameters.name: baseline
parameters.description: Baseline reference for filling the region (zero, min, or custom).

parameters.name: tension
parameters.description: Curve tension applied when using monotone interpolation.

viz_mark_type.description: Normalized mark identifier consumed by renderer adapters.

viz_area_opacity.description: Fill opacity used for the area band.

viz_area_baseline.description: Baseline reference for filling the region.

viz_mark_role.description: Semantic role for heuristics and docs.

viz_mark_a11y_label.description: Accessible description fragment for describing area marks.
viz_mark_a11y_label.default: Area mark representing cumulative or range-based values.

accessibility.notes: Convey baseline reference in descriptive text output.

references: cmos/research/data-viz-oods/RDS.7_synthesis_Mission Completion Report- Trait-Driven Visualization System Specification (v0.1).md

traits.name: MarkBar
traits.description:
Canonical rectangular mark for magnitude comparisons. Supports stacked
or grouped categories and enforces RDS.7 accessiblity requirements for
redundant encodings.

parameters.name: orientation
parameters.description: Axis orientation used for laying out bar rectangles.

parameters.name: bandPadding
parameters.description: Fractional padding between category bands (0-0.5).

parameters.name: cornerRadius
parameters.description: Pixel radius applied to bar corners.

parameters.name: stacking
parameters.description: Aggregation strategy when multiple series share the mark.

viz_mark_type.description: Normalized mark identifier consumed by renderer adapters.

viz_mark_orientation.description: Orientation flag for aligning axes and fallbacks.

viz_mark_band_padding.description: Fractional padding between bars within a category.

viz_mark_corner_radius.description: Corner radius applied to rendered bars.

viz_mark_stacking.description: Stacking semantics applied to grouped series.

viz_mark_role.description: Semantic role used by heuristics, docs, and filtering.

viz_mark_a11y_label.description: Accessible description fragment for assistive tech fallbacks.
viz_mark_a11y_label.default: Bar mark showing magnitude per category.

accessibility.notes: Requires redundant text/table fallback in paired specs.

references: cmos/research/data-viz-oods/RDS.7_synthesis_Mission Completion Report- Trait-Driven Visualization System Specification (v0.1).md

traits.name: MarkLine
traits.description:
Canonical line mark for trends, rates, and progressions. Encodes values as
connected segments with configurable curve smoothing and join policies.

parameters.name: curve
parameters.description: Curve interpolation strategy applied between data points.

parameters.name: strokeWidth
parameters.description: Stroke width in device-independent pixels.

parameters.name: join
parameters.description: Join style applied when segments meet.

parameters.name: enableMarkers
parameters.description: Adds optional point markers on line vertices.

viz_mark_type.description: Normalized mark identifier consumed by renderer adapters.

viz_line_curve.description: Curve interpolation strategy derived from parameters.

viz_line_join.description: Join style used for connecting segments.

viz_line_markers.description: Indicates whether point markers render along the series.

viz_mark_role.description: Semantic role used for heuristics and docs.

viz_mark_a11y_label.description: Accessible description fragment for describing the line mark.
viz_mark_a11y_label.default: Line mark showing change over time or ordered categories.

accessibility.notes: Provide textual summary for trend direction and extrema.

references: cmos/research/data-viz-oods/RDS.7_synthesis_Mission Completion Report- Trait-Driven Visualization System Specification (v0.1).md

traits.name: MarkPoint
traits.description:
Canonical point mark for scatterplots and overlays. Encodes each datum as a
discrete glyph with configurable shape, size, and fill semantics.

parameters.name: shape
parameters.description: Glyph shape rendered for each data point.

parameters.name: size
parameters.description: Default glyph area in square pixels.

parameters.name: fill
parameters.description: Fill strategy for glyph interior.

parameters.name: strokeWidth
parameters.description: Outline stroke width for hollow glyphs.

parameters.name: opacity
parameters.description: Default opacity applied to each point for overplotting.

viz_mark_type.description: Normalized mark identifier consumed by renderer adapters.

viz_point_shape.description: Glyph shape applied to all rendered points by default.

viz_point_size.description: Default glyph area in square pixels.

viz_point_stroke_width.description: Outline stroke width for hollow glyphs.

viz_point_opacity.description: Default opacity used for overplotting mitigation.

viz_mark_role.description: Semantic role for heuristics and docs.

viz_mark_a11y_label.description: Accessible description fragment for describing point marks.
viz_mark_a11y_label.default: Point mark representing discrete values or observations.

accessibility.notes: Provide redundant encoding (color, shape, or texture) per RDV.4.

references: cmos/research/data-viz-oods/RDS.7_synthesis_Mission Completion Report- Trait-Driven Visualization System Specification (v0.1).md

traits.name: Ownerable
traits.description: Adds ownership metadata linking entities to their governing account or principal with transfer auditing.

parameters.name: ownerTypes
parameters.description: Allow list of principals permitted to own the entity.

parameters.name: primaryOwnerType
parameters.description: Default owner type applied when authoring new records.

parameters.name: allowTransfer
parameters.description: Whether ownership may be reassigned after initial creation.

owner_id.description: Identifier of the owning principal scoped by owner_type.

owner_type.description: Categorical owner type sourced from the ownerTypes parameter.

ownership_role.description: Optional role name describing how the owner governs the entity.

ownership_transferred_at.description: Timestamp recording when ownership was last transferred.

accessibility.screenreader: Announces owning principal, type, and transfer state.

traits.name: Preferenceable
traits.description: User preference trait backed by JSONB storage, schema versioning, and registry governance. Encodes namespaces such as theme, notifications, and display with deterministic overrides.

parameters.name: namespaces
parameters.description: Allowed top-level namespaces for preference keys (theme, notifications, display, etc.).

parameters.name: schemaVersion
parameters.description: Current JSON Schema version served by the registry for validation and UI generation.

parameters.name: allowUnknownNamespaces
parameters.description: Escape hatch allowing writes outside the declared namespace allow list.

parameters.name: registryNamespace
parameters.description: Registry identifier used to fetch JSON Schema and uiSchema bundles.

preference_document.description: Normalized preference payload captured by PreferenceStore (version, preferences map, metadata).

preference_metadata.description: Tracks schema version, lastUpdated timestamp, migration records, and source.

preference_version.description: SemVer mirror of preference_document.version for indexing and analytics.

preference_namespaces.description: Materialized namespace list resolved from parameters/registry for auditing.

preference_mutations.description: Monotonic counter incremented whenever preferences mutate (invalidates caches).

accessibility.keyboard: PreferenceEditor supports namespace-by-namespace keyboard traversal with aria landmarks.
accessibility.screenreader: PreferencePanel announces namespace and control labels derived from JSON Schema titles.

traits.name: Priceable
traits.description: Introduces monetization metadata with currency handling, pricing models, and billing cadence semantics.

parameters.name: supportedCurrencies
parameters.description: ISO currency codes permitted for pricing this entity.

parameters.name: defaultCurrency
parameters.description: Currency preselected when authoring pricing information.

parameters.name: pricingModels
parameters.description: Supported strategies describing how the entity is monetized.

parameters.name: billingIntervals
parameters.description: Allowed billing cadences when the pricing model is subscription based.

parameters.name: taxBehavior
parameters.description: Indicates whether prices are tax inclusive or exclusive.

unit_amount_cents.description: Base unit price expressed in the smallest currency denomination.

currency.description: ISO currency code for the unit amount.

pricing_model.description: Monetization model applied to the entity.

billing_interval.description: Billing cadence when pricing_model indicates recurring revenue.

tax_behavior.description: Defines whether taxes are included in the displayed price.

accessibility.screenreader: Announces price, currency, billing interval, and tax behavior.

traits.name: SaaSBillingBillable
traits.description: Normalizes recurring price configuration for SaaS plans including cadence, currency, and trial policy.

parameters.name: defaultCurrency
parameters.description: ISO 4217 currency used when a plan omits currency.

parameters.name: supportedIntervals
parameters.description: Allowed billing intervals that downstream plans may select.

parameters.name: decimalPrecision
parameters.description: Minor unit precision (ex: cents = 2, yen = 0).

plan_code.description: Provider specific identifier for the plan or price.

plan_name.description: Human readable plan label rendered in list and detail contexts.

billing_interval.description: Billing cadence name selected from supportedIntervals.

interval_count.description: Multiplier for interval (ex: 12 with monthly => yearly cadence).

amount_minor.description: Contract value expressed in minor currency units.

currency.description: ISO 4217 currency for the plan price.

trial_period_days.description: Length of introductory trial period in days.

billing_anchor_day.description: Day of month used to anchor renewals when prorating.

traits.name: SaaSBillingMetered
traits.description: Provides usage metering fields for consumption based billing with normalized units and rollover policy.

parameters.name: unit
parameters.description: Canonical usage unit label (ex: seats, credits, api_calls).

parameters.name: rolloverStrategy
parameters.description: Determines how unused units are treated at period end.

parameters.name: sampleWindowDays
parameters.description: Rolling window size used to calculate usage deltas.

meter_name.description: Friendly metered feature name shown in UI (ex: Analytics Seats).

included_quantity.description: Quantity included in base plan before overages.

consumed_quantity.description: Actual quantity consumed in the active period.

unit_label.description: Label for display, defaults to the unit parameter.

period_start.description: Date the usage accumulation window began.

period_end.description: Date the usage accumulation window ends.

rollover_strategy.description: Strategy for unused units (inherits rolloverStrategy parameter).

overage_rate_minor.description: Cost per additional unit expressed in minor currency units.

projected_overage_minor.description: Forecasted overage spend derived from consumption trends.

samples.description: Rolling usage measurements for charts or anomaly detection.

traits.name: SaaSBillingPayable
traits.description: Captures invoice level billing terms, status, and outstanding balance metadata for SaaS finance teams.

parameters.name: statusEnum
parameters.description: Canonical invoice status values allowed by the domain.

parameters.name: paymentTerms
parameters.description: Supported payment term descriptors (ex: net_15, due_upon_receipt).

invoice_number.description: Human readable invoice identifier presented to customers.

status.description: Canonical invoice status after provider mapping.

provider_status.description: Original provider reported status or badge.

issued_at.description: Timestamp when the invoice was finalized or posted.

due_at.description: Payment due timestamp derived from payment terms.

total_minor.description: Total amount due expressed in minor currency units.

balance_minor.description: Remaining amount outstanding in minor units.

payment_terms.description: Payment term label describing when payment is expected.

collection_state.description: Dunning phase or retry program detail presented to success teams.

last_reminder_at.description: Timestamp of most recent payment reminder issued to customer.

aging_bucket_days.description: Number of days outstanding grouped for aging reports.

memo.description: Internal finance note or customer visible memo.

notes: Canonical status options sourced from r4.5 mapping research.

traits.name: SaaSBillingRefundable
traits.description: Describes refund eligibility, policy windows, and credit memo tracking for SaaS billing flows.

parameters.name: defaultWindowDays
parameters.description: Default number of days after payment where refunds are allowed.

parameters.name: creditMemoTypes
parameters.description: Supported credit memo categories used by finance teams.

refundable_until.description: Date when refund eligibility window ends for this record.

refund_policy_url.description: Link to customer facing refund or cancellation policy.

total_refunded_minor.description: Cumulative amount refunded in minor currency units.

credit_memo_balance_minor.description: Remaining credit memo balance that can be applied to invoices.

credit_memo_type.description: Category of credit memo tied to business justification.

last_refund_at.description: Timestamp when the most recent refund was issued.

requires_manager_approval.description: Indicates if finance manager approval is required before issuing refund.

notes.description: Internal commentary about refund actions or policy exceptions.

notes: Aligns with refund governance requirements captured in billing domain research.

traits.name: ScaleLinear
traits.description:
Shared linear/continuous scale definition used by positional, color, and
size encodings. Provides normalized domain/range metadata plus zero baseline
enforcement per RDV.3 findings.

parameters.name: domainMin
parameters.description: Default lower domain bound applied when unspecified.

parameters.name: domainMax
parameters.description: Default upper domain bound applied when unspecified.

parameters.name: rangeMin
parameters.description: Default lower range bound (normalized 0-1).

parameters.name: rangeMax
parameters.description: Default upper range bound (normalized 0-1).

parameters.name: clamp
parameters.description: Whether values outside the domain should clamp to edges.

parameters.name: zeroBaseline
parameters.description: Forces zero to be included in the domain.

parameters.name: mode
parameters.description: Whether this scale behaves as continuous or band for categories.

viz_scale_linear_domain_min.description: Lower domain bound for continuous encodings.

viz_scale_linear_domain_max.description: Upper domain bound for continuous encodings.

viz_scale_linear_clamp.description: Indicates whether values outside the domain clamp to bounds.

viz_scale_linear_zero_baseline.description: Forces zero within the domain for accessibility compliance.

references: cmos/research/data-viz-oods/RDS.7_synthesis_Mission Completion Report- Trait-Driven Visualization System Specification (v0.1).md

traits.name: ScaleTemporal
traits.description:
Temporal scale definition with timezone awareness and "nice" interval
rounding. Powers chronological encodings across Position, Area, and Line
traits per RDS.7 specification.

parameters.name: domainStart
parameters.description: ISO-8601 timestamp representing the lower bound.

parameters.name: domainEnd
parameters.description: ISO-8601 timestamp representing the upper bound.

parameters.name: rangeMin
parameters.description: Normalized lower range bound (0-1).

parameters.name: rangeMax
parameters.description: Normalized upper range bound (0-1).

parameters.name: timezone
parameters.description: Olson/IANA timezone identifier used when formatting ticks.

parameters.name: nice
parameters.description: Interval used when rounding ticks.

parameters.name: outputFormat
parameters.description: Default date format string for axes + fallbacks.

viz_scale_temporal_timezone.description: Olson/IANA timezone identifier for ticks + tooltips.

viz_scale_temporal_output_format.description: Default format string for textual output.

references: cmos/research/data-viz-oods/RDS.7_synthesis_Mission Completion Report- Trait-Driven Visualization System Specification (v0.1).md

traits.name: Stateful
traits.description: Normalizes lifecycle state transitions and exposes canonical status semantics.

parameters.name: states
parameters.description: Ordered list of valid lifecycle states exposed to consumers.

parameters.name: initialState
parameters.description: State assigned when an entity is created.

status.description: Canonical lifecycle state derived from the states parameter.

traits.name: Taggable
traits.description: Adds configurable tag management with guardrails for custom authoring and taxonomy alignment.

parameters.name: maxTags
parameters.description: Maximum number of tags that can be attached to an entity.

parameters.name: allowCustomTags
parameters.description: Whether editors may author tags outside of the approved allow list.

parameters.name: allowedTags
parameters.description: Curated allow list of permitted tags when custom creation is disabled.

parameters.name: caseSensitive
parameters.description: Whether tag comparisons should treat casing as significant.

tags.description: Ordered list of tags assigned to the entity.

tag_count.description: Computed number of tags assigned to the entity.

traits.name: Timestampable
traits.description: Captures creation and update timestamps with configurable audit metadata for lifecycle tracking.

parameters.name: recordedEvents
parameters.description: Canonical lifecycle events captured in the audit timeline.

parameters.name: timezone
parameters.description: Default timezone context applied when rendering timestamps.

parameters.name: allowNullUpdatedAt
parameters.description: Whether updated_at may be omitted when no mutations have occurred.

created_at.description: Timestamp recording when the entity was first created.

updated_at.description: Timestamp for the most recent modification, when available.

last_event.description: Lifecycle event associated with the most recent timestamp mutation.

last_event_at.description: Timestamp for the lifecycle event captured in last_event.

accessibility.screenreader: Announces creation and last update information with lifecycle context.

objects.name: Article
objects.description: Canonical editorial article with hybrid taxonomy + tag classification for CMS surfaces.

changelog.description: Initial article object composing hybrid Classifiable mode for taxonomy + tags.

objects.name: Invoice
objects.description: Canonical SaaS invoice object normalizing payment terms, status, and refund posture.

objects.name: Media
objects.description: Canonical digital asset metadata powering media library, DAM, and CMS integrations.

changelog.description: Initial Media object with tag-mode Classifiable integration for asset folksonomy.

objects.name: Organization
objects.description: Canonical account record for tenant and workspace governance across the platform.

changelog.description: Added Authable trait to expose membership and entitlement exports for tenant governance.
Added Addressable trait for headquarters, branch, office, and warehouse roles.

objects.name: Plan
objects.description: Normalized plan definition capturing pricing, packaging, and entitlement metadata.

objects.name: Product
objects.description: Canonical catalog entry combining pricing, lifecycle, and merchandising metadata.

changelog.description: Added Classifiable trait (taxonomy mode) for hierarchical categories + breadcrumbs.

objects.name: Relationship
objects.description: Canonical graph edge linking two entities with lifecycle, ownership, and tagging semantics.

objects.name: Subscription
objects.description: Canonical SaaS subscription object composed from lifecycle, pricing, and usage traits with provider mapping.

objects.name: Subscription
objects.description: Canonical subscription record composing lifecycle, billing, and cancellation semantics.

changelog.description: Initial subscription composition integrating State, Cancellation, Billing, and Timeline traits.

objects.name: Transaction
objects.description: Canonical transaction record tracking monetary movement, lifecycle, and audit metadata.

objects.name: Usage
objects.description: Metered usage snapshot for consumption based billing supporting trend analysis and overage forecasting.

objects.name: User
objects.description: Canonical identity record representing a platform user across lifecycle contexts.

changelog.description: Composed Authable trait to attach RBAC memberships and entitlement exports.
Added Preferenceable trait for schema-governed user preferences (theme, notifications, display, privacy).
Added Addressable trait for multi-role user addresses (home, billing, shipping).
Simplified composition for view engine integration (Stateful, Timestampable, Taggable).

patterns.title: Dashboard Composition Pattern
patterns.summary: The dashboard composition pattern packages trait-provided visualizations into

patterns.title: The Pure Modifier Pattern
patterns.summary: Pure modifiers are the backbone of deterministic composition in the OODS view engine. A modifier is a synchronous function that receives the props for a rendered section and returns a partial set of props to merge. It must behave like a pure function: deterministic output, no side effects, and no mutation of its inputs.
